website_summaries.verdict: Great for beginners, this nail dryer works quickly and lasts a long time.
pros: Gel nails cure in as little as 30 seconds
LED lights last a long time
Can use right out of the box
cons: Must do thumb separately in order to get it to dry evenly

customer_reviews.title: I recommend 100%
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product . Definately can dry down gel polishes within 30 seconds but i use 60 seconds just to be on the safe side . It great for beginners and easy to use . Definately worth the investment if you want to get a better nail dryer but don’t want to spend a lot of money .
customer_reviews.author: Rayneisha Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love this! GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp works great!! My tips for you? Use nail polish remover to remove dirt, polish, and oil from your nails. Remember that the base coat and color coats will still be tacky after curing. This will deal with the top coat. And using some sort of cuticle oil will really help prevent damage and drying of your beds after you finish your gel session!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi1993

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine
customer_reviews.text: I have done my nails like three times already... I did my daughters, nails for her birthday... And my moms.... This machine is awesome- I've used it for my hands and my feet.. I love it🙋🏽
customer_reviews.author: Me'

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Overall I definitely like this UV lamp. It is aesthetically pleasing and it gets the job done. I definitely would recommend that you cure your nails for longer than the recommended time. I chose to glass cure my thumb and pinky fingers as they seemed to need approval time top fully set. In addition you must make sure that your coats of polish are as thin as possible or the it will not cure and you may have rippling or bubbling. Other than that I'd say this was a great purchase and I would recommend it. Be sure to use an alcohol or another cleansing agent to wipe off your nails after they are cured as they will be tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: This was my first gel polish light and I love it! It works great
customer_reviews.text: This was my first gel polish light and I love it! It works great! Just make sure you use a base coat then the color then a top coat for the best results. ALSO VERY IMPORTANT to remember after you cure the last coat there will be a sticky film on the nail and it feels like it is still wet, just use a paper towel and rubbing alcohol to remove the film and they will be good to go! I thought the lamp wasn't working properly when I first started using it because I did not know about that last step!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This worked great. The first time I use I only had ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked great. The first time I use I only had an LED polish and nothing more. It wasn't really that great. I took the time and money to invest in the Gelish set with the base foundation and top coat. I used everything tonight with two coats of the gel polish in between the foundation and the top coat. I cured each for 90 seconds. My nails look just like they do when I get them done in the salon. Okay well not exactly because I'm not quite as talented but they are pretty damn good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works wonderfully. You can see the kit link here
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a couple of times now and it works perfectly. I use Gelish full size basic care kit and as long as you follow all of the steps, it works wonderfully. You can see the kit link here:  I do one hand at a time and use the 60 second timer for each coat. There is plenty of room for your hand and this product doesn't feel cheap. Looks like it will last a long time. I recommended this same nail lamp to my best friend and sister.
customer_reviews.author: a_sloth

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I would recommend this product. I did a lot of research before buying this particular LED Lamp, and watched YouTube reviews on this, and other products like it, and everyone boasted about this brand, and item. I like how you can remove the base, so that you can do your pedicure too. It's super easy to use right out of the box, and looks exactly like the photos provided. Not all similar products have a button for each time frame needed, this one is perfect! I would think this would be a great gift for anyone that likes to do their own gel nails, like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Marshall

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! I've read other reviews saying it was small
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I've read other reviews saying it was small; and they couldnt put all of their fingers inside. That is an invalid statement, i have fat fingers and i can put my entire hand foot inside the led lamp. As far as the curing time 1 min flat is all it takes! Ive tested this aganist my uv curing lamp. And by far this wins the curing time. Why spend 3 min when uou can spend 1min.....i love it
customer_reviews.author: Child_of_God

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This works well and I was happy it was LED as opposed to UV. I am really happy with how fast it dries and the cord is long enough to plug into the wall and still sit up on my dining room table. It is hard to get all 4 fingers and my thumb in, I usually dry my thumbs separate so they are more upright. It is so worth the investment of buying a lights, some gels, and few supplies. I will have money back and more after three manicures. I watched a few youtube gel nail how tos and I was set!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great LED lamp. I’m a beginner at nails and this product is easy to use and great quality. My nails are cured within 30 seconds, after a couple coats I like to put them in for 90 seconds and I’ve had no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Nail dryer works great, but not all five fingers at the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Nail dryer works great, but not all five fingers at the same time. Tried twice with 5 fingers from the same hand, but the thumb didn't set properly, color was off and drippy. What did work was four fingers from one hand with the thumb from the other hand. I'll use this method from now on. I'm very happy with the result. That way you can hold the thumb upright light the other fingers. All get a great set. Well worth the money of the lamp. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Davee Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Good light but my fingers get swollen and itchy.
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I'm sensitive to this sort of light since UV lamps has never been an issue? Ever since I started using this lamp my citicles has been getting blisters, they swell and they itch like crazy. I've honestly never heard of anything like this before, but it always happens after using the lamp, even with different products and weeks apart. Very upsetting since it IS a good lamp that dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical, turned beyond pleased!
customer_reviews.text: For someone who has just started the art of nails, and really has very little knowledge of how to do them herself and a lot of knowledge of how they should look when they are done, I'm pleased! I have tried other LED dryers, but this nail dryer is giving me the necessary tools to dry my nails appropriately. Now I just need to master my own technique! Thank you~
customer_reviews.author: Amber Halford

customer_reviews.title: This does NOT work! I did some nails yesterday ...
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT work! I did some nails yesterday using this for the first time and no matter how long I put them under the light they didn't dry. Very displeased!! If I had the box I'd send this back TODAY!! Waste of my money! I mean nails were NOT dry at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Love this LED light
customer_reviews.text: Love this LED light. I've been doing my own gel manicures for about a year. I started with a double UV light bcuz I THOUGHT it would make sense to dry both hands at once (plus the uv light came with a fan dryer). I prefer this melody Susie led light. It makes more sense to me to dry four fingers at a time bcuz the gel self-levels. And the led light drys in half the time as the uv AND the uv bulbs blow (mine did after about two months). There are 4 time settings, 30 sec, 60 sec, 90 sec and 30 MINUTES (I actually might start using the 30 min to flash cure my free edges).
customer_reviews.author: McJohns

customer_reviews.title: LED upgrade so worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good so far. I've followed the instructions to the letter and get a better result than my previous non-LED light in much less time, so it is totally worth it. A warning though: While I can fit all 5 fingers in here, the angle that my thumb is at can cause it to not cure as well despite the lights and mirrors. I just do my thumbs separately, as it is still a time saver over my old, non-LED light. This probably varies depending on your hand size and how well you can get your thumb in there flat instead of angled. I would at least try doing all 5 a couple of times, it might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Loving this lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new toy! This lamp is great! I'm not a nail tech , this is my very first time doing my own gel Mani and I must say it came out nice, I used the 60 secto cure my nails just to make sure the gel was completely dry ( next time I'll try the 30sec) and it delivered! I was hesitant to buy this lamp because of the price but surprisingly I was wrong
customer_reviews.author: Clavel

customer_reviews.title: Still works well after more than 3 years
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of this nail dryer as a gift, the first was for myself. My first purchase is still working great after over 3 years of using it 1-2 times per month! Very compact, too. I have large hands so I do my thumbs separately so I don't have to put my hand/arm in a weird angle.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: For better drying, thin layers and longer drying time is ...
customer_reviews.text: This dryer does the job well. For better drying, thin layers and longer drying time are recommended. I get a better result if I do 60sec instead of 30. I think this is necessary because the dryer is a lower wattage (12W). Also, it's recommended that you do the thumbs separately. The polish tends to settle a bit on the sides of the thumbs when done with the rest of your fingers because they can't be placed flatly when drying the entire hand. Wet cotton ball with rubbing alcohol to remove sticky/tacky residue after top coat is cured. Standard Shipping was super fast. Dryer is lightweight and doesn't look like much, but does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Xwell1950

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was hesitant to purchase the MelodySusie lamp due to the price being very reasonable! I had been wanting to purchase an LED lamp for a long time, but was always thrown off by the prices. After reading the reviews for the lamp, I was convinced that I should buy it, and boy am I ever glad I did :) It arrived within the time frame given and was packaged very well. I tried it out when I got home and it worked amazingly! no problems at all. I used Sally Hansen Salon Gel Polish and it worked perfectly! Overall, it's a great product and I am glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. I have used the CND UV lamp for years, and love it, but don't love how long it takes to set. I wanted to get an LED lamp to cut down on setting time, but didn't want to spend as much as I did on the CND lamp, so I decided to give this a try. This lamp is nice and light weight and a lot more compact than my other lamp. It sets the nails just as well as a hight priced lamp. My only gripe is the rather flimsy cord, however, it's replacable and wouldn't be able to find a replacement if ever this one decids to give out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner LED Nail Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this light as a beginner in doing gel nails. I have never had any problems with the MelodySusie. It has been fun to do gel nails at home with this light. I would say for the price, this is a good quality nail dryer. I used to work at a nail salon, and in my honest opinion I really think that the lights are pretty much all the same. So finding this good deal was definitely something that I wanted to try.
customer_reviews.author: Elise S

customer_reviews.title: I love this product because it has a ton of LED ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it has a ton of LED lights and fits my whole hand. However I specifically purchased this light because the other reviews said your whole hand can fit inside. What the reviews did not say, is how your whole hand fits inside but the gel polish shifts and slides down your thumb nail because of the angle of your finger. Your thumb isn't completely covered with lights which means it doesn't cure the polish all the way causing the polish to slide down your nail and create bulges/bubble. Other than that, it's a great light!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to cure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp about a month ago. It takes quite a while to cure, especially to cure Gellish brand nail polish. It will hold me over for now, but as soon as I am able to I will be purchasing a new lamp. Doing my tips and gel manicures on my own has saved me quite a bit of money, but time is money and this lamp takes a very long time to cure! I need something that will work quicker!
customer_reviews.author: Selina Lopez

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a few months now and it works great. I was hoping all 5 fingers could go ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few months now and it works great. I was hoping all 5 fingers could go in at once and and they cannot. I was disappointed about this at first, but most of them are this size and it is so much faster than the big one that I had that I don't mind doing my thumbs separately. (if I try to do the whole hand at once, the side of the thumb or the pinky do not cure properly and wipe off)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable nail lamp
customer_reviews.text: This works to cure your UV/LED gel polish. I like the timer function and this lamp is easy to use. I have not had any problems using it with any of my gel polishes. I feel like this is a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and time that you will save
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I can now do my nails at home without going to the salon every 2-3 weeks. I had one that came with the Sally Hansen package but you could only cure 4 fingers at a time and then the thumb separately. For gels that require more than 15 seconds to cure, the lamp was not idea. With this one, it is solved. You have the choice of 30-60-90 seconds! And my whole hand fits at once, saving even more time.
customer_reviews.author: JCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product about 10 times so far and it works perfectly. Not sure how long it would last if you are a nail tech but if you are someone who does your own nails it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good price and works fine so far
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing an older LED gel nail curing light and was glad to get this one for a good price. It has twice the wattage as my old one and a lot more bulbs. I used it today for the first time and it worked fine. I also like that it has a mirrored base so my hand isn't resting on the table. I suppose also that reflects the LED light from the bulbs to enhance curing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!!! The MelodySusie nail dryer was way better than the first one I bought (somewhere else). It dries quickly and the mirrors inside help make the drying even. Also, I was able to fit all 4 fingers and my thumb to dry at once, which I couldn't do with the other one. 12W works just like the professional one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home manicures
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this almost two years ago. I was writing another review when all the previous purchases I hadn’t reviewed popped up. I don’t know why I didn’t write one for this because it’s literally amazing. This has saved me so much money and time. It works perfectly with my OPI gel polished and two years in I have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: kaeleigh johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Yes, I heat on every layer, sometimes for the whole 30 minutes. No, not 30 seconds, you have to for 30 minutes each layer. I am using LED gel polish. My black polish actually turns a bluish color. So dissapointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It works very well and doesn't take any longer than it should. This is a great curing light for my gel polish. It's easy to use and easy storing. It's also compact so it doesn't take up too much space. I only do one hand at a time so it's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: C B

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for home Gelish manicure
customer_reviews.text: Worked great right out of the box. I bought this to cure my Gelish products - works really fast. I take really good care of my stuff so I expect this little lamp will last a long time. Great reviews encouraged me to buy it, and I believe it will prove to be an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: This sucks! And don’t believe the reviews
customer_reviews.text: This sucks! And don’t believe the reviews! It doesn’t dry the gel at all. I have literally don’t it for 30 min each hand and still isn’t dry! It’s only 12W!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great, strong lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is rad. I had a Gelish 5-45 LED lamp and it has nothing on this. The MelodySusie is a strong, attractive lamp. I have to cure my thumbs separately, which is fine. It can cure toes! The Gelish lamp could not do that for me. This lamp is great for the price. If you're on the fence, just go for it. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: moo shoo

customer_reviews.title: Great performance, and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I think I'm in love. I own a 36W UV light, and a MelodySusie 6W LED light. This blows them both out of the water...It's awesome! Since I've had it, I haven't had ANY gel lifting problems, after 3 weeks on each of several different manicures. I love this, and would DEFINITELY buy it again. I do have to say, though...I don't like that the buttons to turn on the light beep every time you use them...which gets a little annoying. However, for its awesome performance, I can overlook a little annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Works best for kid nails
customer_reviews.text: Well... I wanted to love this ... but I didn’t realize it was a 12w. It won’t cure any gel polish I’ve bought 4 different brands. Ended up purchasing a different led light off of amazon and bc it is a 48w it does cure and nails actually last 2 weeks. It’s good for the kids nails but not for teenager/adult nails. So if you want this for the Little’s it’s perfect!! But not for adult use :((
customer_reviews.author: nicole banks

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: This baby does just what it's supposed to do. It's lightweight, compact, and sleek looking. It works right out of the box and required no setup. Just plug in and start! I think this is a great value for the money and I'm very pleased with my purchase. If you're looking to do shellac at home, this lamp is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ValP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, great product design
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It is the perfect size to fit my whole hand and it is very easy to use. . It successfully dried multiple brands of compatible nail polish. I would absolutely recommend this lamp to friends
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J Wright

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp; I use it to cure gel polish and builder gel for nail extensions and it works great every time. Most polishes and builder gel take a minute to cure, and they cure evenly as well. My only complaint is depending on the size of your hand you might not be able to fit your whole hand so thumbs have to be cured separately but honestly that doesn't really bother me. The size is also great for carrying around with you to clients or even if it's just on your desk, doesn't take up a lot of space. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: fairlady_c

customer_reviews.title: Money saver!
customer_reviews.text: This thing will give you lasting gel nails just as a salon would, but at a fraction of the price. It pays for itself within the first couple manicures/pedicures. My nails last forever when I use this with no chipping or peeling. Gel polish is a pain to get off- but if you don't mind going through that process when you want to remove it this light is beyond worth it!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: This lamp had some pretty good reviews so I decided to try one out. On one hand I feel for the money it costs it is worth it. On the other hand I feel I should’ve just bought a better quality lamp. It takes longer for your nail to dry then the times they give. The gel does not feel as hard as I’ve seen it get with other lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great Nail Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING product for the price!! Works amazing, Great for at home gel manicures!! I was a little skeptical because there are tons of nail lamps for double and triple the price of this one. I've been using this for a couple months now & it still works just as good as the day I pulled it out of the box! Very happy with my purchase!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: One Thing They Dont Show Youu
customer_reviews.text: This Lamp is a very friendly beginner lamp. I Actually Like The Lamp But It Comes With One Con . The LED Lights Inside The Machine Are ONLY At The Top Part Of The Lamp. Which Means Youu Would Have To Cure Youu Or Your Clients Thumb Separate . I Find This To Be Very Annoying , But Overall I Do Like It But I Will Soon Be Replacing It With A Better One. I Hope This Helps !!
customer_reviews.author: Shalana

customer_reviews.title: Fits all 5 fingers!!
customer_reviews.text: Used with gellish basics set and red carpet nail color. Dried each coat for 60 sec and it worked with one shot! Didn't try it at the 30sec since I was short on time and wanted to be sure it was done in one shot. Love that my whole hand fits so that saves time. Wish it came with a little dust bag for storage. Using one that came with a pair shoes and that works fine. Great item!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: spr95fs8

customer_reviews.title: WIPE NAILS WITH ALCOHOL AFTER CURING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Biggest piece of advice is after you cure your nail polish it's going to still feel tacky. You just take a cotton swab with some alcohol and rub it on the nail and the tackiness will go away; it's just like when you go to the nail salon. This product works great highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alesha Bales

customer_reviews.title: Crazy fast drying time. . .
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with Gelish nails. This LED lamp dried my nails in 30 seconds per coat. My nails were done in eight minutes (I did my thumbs separate)! I went back and forth between this lamp and the UV lamps. Drying time would have been two minutes per coat. Anything is better than waiting on regular polish to dry on your nails, but 30 seconds is wonderful. I would recommend this lamp to anyone just starting to use Gelish products!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought my wife this nail dryer. She was very happy that it worked so well. The dryer plugs in and has 4 timers on it; 30s, 60s, 90s, & 30m. It does not have a timer display. I bought this with prime and it came right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Javonitalla

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to try this nail dryer. After I finished I was very surprised to see that I did my nails myself. I used CND shellac and it worked very well. It was sticky, but after wiping the nails with 78% alcohol, they were perfect. I am a retired cosmetologist and always did my own nails. Had the gel or shellac at a salon and was amazed how long the polish stays perfect. Next time I will do one hand until it is finished and then do the other.
customer_reviews.author: Edgourmet

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little lamp, especially for the price. I was worried that it wouldn't be powerful enough with just 12W, but it worked like a charm on my Gelish nail polish. The timing buttons are very self explanitory and it fits my hand perfectly, overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A.

customer_reviews.title: This is it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I've used this twice so far. Once with OPI polish and once with Gelish. It did a great job both times! Remember your nails will feel a little "gummy" or "tacky" when you finish, but a wipe with rubbing alcohol takes away the residue leaving you with beautiful nails. Mine last at least two weeks. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So glad I decided to buy this. Nails dry in 60s per layer. Ive noticed that the thumb needs to go in separately or it wont dry completely. Works great for feet too. Love this and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use and large enough for me to place ...
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and large enough for me to place my whole hand in. The only thing though is when I place my whole hand in, my thumb doesn't seem to get cured completely. I usually do my thumbs separate and alone because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Pencil This

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for those who are short on space and want to do gel manicures quickly 30 seconds LED "cure time" vs 2 min UV "cure time" It is very light and easy to carry around, works very well with Gelish and LeChat gel, I do suggest, that you look at your gel polishes to make sure that they are LED curable. True there is enough space for all five fingers but if you find your thumb is not curing properly..I suggest you put in your thumb alone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this light to me and I loved it so much I purchased it for another friend. Super easy to use and store.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: highly recomended for personal light use. not big enough to dry the 5 fingers but SUPER EFFICIENT!. dries gels in 30s
customer_reviews.text: its super convinient to carry around. very light weight. plug cord is longer than expected which was also a plus. and it dries gels that would take up to 2 min on a UV lamp in as low as 30s!!!! I love it. my only mistake is that this wasnt for personal use and this particular one was a little small. I can only do the 4 fingers then the thumb. other than that I loved it. I am actually considering buying a bigger one of the same brand. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Heart Shaped Tortillas

customer_reviews.title: Works so GOOD!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this figuring as inexpensive as it was I would get what I paid for. It works great! I use it close to weekly and have no complaints. Usually I do 2 x 90s runs for each coat but that is just to be safe. I am getting close to perfecting my at home gel mani and pedi's
customer_reviews.author: KathyKay

customer_reviews.title: it came out awesome!! Very impressed with the results
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Gellen gel polish to use with this lamp, and for my very first time doing a gel manicure, it came out awesome!! Very impressed with the results, and how quick and easy it was. The machine fits my entire hand so getting both hands done literally takes about 5-10minutes. It’s small and light weight so I can pretty much take it anywhere and everywhere to do my girls nails. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie M

customer_reviews.title: I love doing my own gel nails!!!! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully! I’ve had it for a few months now and I’ve actially dropped it a couple times, and it still works like perfection 😇 I ordered black, and my mother in law ordered white. Both are great, except my black one shows more fingerprints 😆 overall- great product. My gel nails look like I went to a salon!!!!! Super thrilled that I can do this myself in the comfort of my own home!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: but I like that it's LED and won't damage your skin and ...
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat small, with no tray to place your fingers on then slide in so they don't get smudged, but I like that it's LED and won't damage your skin and the lights are more durable. Small but sturdy; seems well made. You'll want to do your thumbs separately because they wont fit well all at once in here and wont cure gel properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only 12 watts
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think that 12 watts is strong enough to dry to a hard finish. I wish I had purchased one with a higher wattage. However it is easy to use and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Womp

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great size, quick shipping! Can fit entire hand (with thumb) or all toes (I'm a wide size 10 foot!). I use OPI nail polish, which is for UV or LED, and I run the the 90s cycle twice. My nails have looked great for over a week! After purchasing gel polish and this light, I will make my money back after 2 manicures, very glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. Couldn't be more pleased. Worked great the first time I ever used it and the first time I ever did gel nails for myself.
customer_reviews.author: JennyH

customer_reviews.title: made my cuticle bed feel like it was on fire when i used it.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp would burn my cuticles. Also the package was labeled that long term use causes cancer...Cancer is very deadly and I will not be using this unhealthy product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: best lamp!!! I've now had it for 3 years & still works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Marlem Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice curing machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this nail curing machine. It has 4 settings. I wish it had a 2 minute timer, but by combining either the 90 secs and 30 secs or using 1 min two times I get to the 2 mins that are required for curing my current gel polish.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this! i wanted to buy my own LED ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this ! i wanted to buy my own LED lamp so save me some $$$ instead of having to go back every 2 weeks to a salon and sometimes i get so busy i go so long without being able to go into a salon. anyway, this is AMAZING it's small so it doesn't take up much space but big enough to fit your whole hand. and the 30sec. works so well, ( i use GELISH gel nail polish ) is sets in 30sec. it goes perfect with this lamp. and you can buy the gelish nail polish on amazon too SO BUNDLE ! its totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Melizza Solis

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and great product
customer_reviews.text: Great seller and great product! I literally ordered my lamp Friday evening and received it first thing Monday! I replaced my flimsy little 4 watt Gelish mini lamp with this beautiful professional looking/quality lamp and don't even know what took me this long to make the switch. I recommend this seller and this beautiful product to anyone who wants great customer service and a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re debating buying this nail dryer, just go ahead and DO IT. This has totally changed the nail game for me. I usually do my mani’s and pedi’s myself and have tried other (cheaper) nail lamps, but this one far outshines them all. It will definitely save you money in the long run, and it’s so easy and quick to use!
customer_reviews.author: Gabbi

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SO FAR!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this LED lamp. I purchased to use for myself at home. Although my entire hand fits, I still do my thumb separate because I noticed that the side of my thumb wasnt curing properly. I also do it for 60 seconds, and it works so good!!! Perfect for pedicures as well! Definitely recommend if you want to do this at home on your own. You save so much money!! Just takes time and patience!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Nail tech student, love this. I don't use it every day like in the salons, but at least a few times a week. It works great. Weak lights though, so certain gels like ibd need longer cure times. Make sure if you're doing whole hand that you cure the thumb again separately, because the bottom does not reflect enough to cure the entire nail.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Dien

customer_reviews.title: First led/uv lamp I've tried. Mirror wipes clean with ...
customer_reviews.text: First led/uv lamp I've tried. Mirror wipes clean with a damp paper towel. Everything appears to cure in the right amount of time. I've used it with Sensationail, following their cure times; Red Carpet, following their cure times; Bundle Monster, guessing at cure times but using shorter suggested times, and Fingerpaints, 30-60 seconds per coat.
customer_reviews.author: Smelly SmingsleyTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: But it's amazing. It's very fast
customer_reviews.text: New to gel nails, so I've only used this light. But it's amazing. It's very fast! Tip: paint your thumb separately. If you don't you won't cure the sides of your thumb and pinky finger. My friends have had the same experience with other lights. Just save your thumbs for last :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Will not cure nails no matter how long I use. I thought it may have been the polish, so I bought all new professional polish (OPI), and still no luck!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, perfect size! Yet still compact enough for storage. Seems to be of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny H

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This nail dryer is perfect for my needs. It cures my gel super fast. It's lightweight and can go a whole hand at one time. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Carl

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts 7 days, not 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I received this lamp in early December and it took awhile to get the hang of it, but I've been disappointed with my polish only lasting 7 days and that's usually with tolerating some peeling. I used only Gellish brand and follow all the instructions with PH Bond and everything. Looks like I might have to invest in a UV lamp. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Billy Rutter

customer_reviews.title: This product does not work
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in, painted my nails on left hand, placed my hand inside, nails were not dry after 3 tries.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kinsella

customer_reviews.title: Works great, doesnt cure all 5 fingers
customer_reviews.text: I've used the light only once so far, but I like it! It was incredibly easy to set up (just plug and go) and the automatic timers are great. It's light so you can move it around easy and it's super quiet too. My only complaint would be that while it says you can do a five-finger cure, the inside part of my thumbs didn't cure and I had to do it all over again. I now will cure them separately, so it's not a huge deal, just be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. It works as it says and seemed to be salon quality.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my at-home gel manicures. I've had this product for about 3 years, and it's still in excellent condition and works perfectly. I definitely recommend, and will purchase this product again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: toyale

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've bought all year
customer_reviews.text: First nail lamp I've ever bought. Absolutely in love with it. This lamp is very strong and works super well on gel nails I do, plus it has good settings and easy to work with
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Portogallo

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for anyone who does nails
customer_reviews.text: I wish had a bought this sooner! Itʻs made life so much easier as Iʻm allowed to use my freshly painted nails in just a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: M Cooper-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: It definitely works as advertised and I was very happy with how my nails came out
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works as advertised and I was very happy with how my nails came out. I used it on both my nails and feet, but I did make sure the bottom was supported when using it on my feet to make sure I didn't damage the bottom tray. It is a little on the small side (smaller than the professional sized ones at the salon), so it may not be as good for those with larger hands/feet.
customer_reviews.author: brandon brown

customer_reviews.title: Love this. It fits my whole hand to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It fits my whole hand to get all my nails or even my foot to do toe nails. I love the different timer options and how it shuts off automatically when the time is up. I'm a newbie to gel nails and this curing light is magic. I usually do 90 seconds and my nails are set sometimes if I did a thick coat I'll do an extra 90 second to make myself feel better. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are hard to see, as far as details go... but I was rather impressed with this little machine. My nails cured quickly and I felt like I just walked out of a salon. But saved 40-50$$. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Briana M.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it a lot but it works perfectly for my LED/UV top coat. I also have large hands and they fit without any issues in this unit! I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda F. DoveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very neat product. Comes in nice packaging and it's not too big. I've used it only a few times so far and it does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Esar

customer_reviews.title: I love this light
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! It works so well. I love that it has multiple timers that I can set for the different things I'm doing. I love being able to do my own gel polish with this light.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Surtees

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as it should - and for a great price. I am so excited to do my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as it should - and for a great price. I am so excited to do my gels a home now. This thing will pay for itself really quickly. I use it with OPI GelColor and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Marge S.

customer_reviews.title: ... hoping it wouldn't be complicated and this was as easy to use as possible
customer_reviews.text: I never used gels before so I was hoping it wouldn't be complicated and this was as easy to use as possible. Recommended times are already programmed in and it's a cute design...I'm extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol A.

customer_reviews.title: Will recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Best Christmas present I've ever bought for myself. Light weight and sturdy. I use gel polish and 30 seconds works perfectly. My hand fits easily inside.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: portable, effective, cute: ) Works on all ...
customer_reviews.text: portable, effective, cute :) Works on all of my UV gel polish with no problems. I set dark colors with the 90 second setting and light colors/top coats with the 60 sec setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I just use the 60 second timer for every coat
customer_reviews.author: Shelbie Francisco

customer_reviews.title: It works well!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this lamp... It cures my gels beautifully. So far I haven't had any problems at all...
customer_reviews.author: Shazzie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is the light I use when traveling! Light weight! Easy to use ! Only bad thing is that it’s very tight
customer_reviews.author: Jaquasia

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money easy to use timer and light weight
customer_reviews.author: Shaunterria Glover

customer_reviews.title: but I love this light
customer_reviews.text: I am new to gel polish, but I love this light. I did research on LED vs UV ray lights and felt this was a much healthier option. Dried each layer of gel polish in 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley
